title: Midway Between You and Me
description: Mills & Boon Blush series brings you moving, true-to-life romancesShe doesn't love a man in uniform  Professor Tam Nguyen knows that most women dream of a handsome, broad-shouldered military man. But she can never forget that the man who abandoned her pregnant mother in the middle of a war zone wore a uniform.   Of course, that's before she meets Lieutenant Bowie Prince and gets to know the man behind the uniform. Once he sets out to change her mind, she finds him hard to resist. Until she discovers he holds the key to her father's identity .
author: Rogenna Brewer
